title: This amazing job will pay you $10,000 a month to stay in luxury homes all over the world
text:
This amazing job will pay you $10,000 a month to stay in luxury homes all over the world Itching to move around but can’t afford the cost that comes with continent-hopping? Well, this amazing job will pay you $10,000 a month to stay in luxury homes all over the world, aaand we should probably apply with the quickness because our bags have already packed themselves.
According to Thrillist, this most fantabulous job listing comes courtesy of THIRDHOME, a luxury property and travel club that’s offering a lucky applicant a monthly salary hefty enough to cover the rent on the Friends apartment and then some.
Sadly, not even 10 stacks a month covers the cost of The Notebook house , but you can still totally live out your unfulfilled MTV Cribs fantasies in one of the 12 luxury vacation homes THIRDHOME is willing to pay you to stay in.

via GIPHY 
Now, for even more delightful deets on the dream job you didn’t know existed: THIRDHOME accurately refers to this unbelievably cushy gig as “the best job on the planet,” and based on the job duties, we couldn’t agree more. The ideal candidate must have “excellent writing skills,” experience with international travel, as well a professional background that includes social media, writing, blogging and vlogging, and must also be available to globe-trot for three months, since it’s a contract job.

via GIPHY 
The company is also footing all travel expenses, and will allow a companion to tag along on their own dime.
Applicants have until March 30, 2017 to submit a one-minute video detailing why they are the best person for this job.
Good luck to all the applicants! It’s time to make those #careergoals a reality.
